3.0.0-beta.13.en:
Prevent missing of events, due to socket drop within ring-api-client
Improve device logging

3.0.0-beta.12.en:
Fix error in beta.11 in regards to new installations
Harden Event Handling to prevent rare permanent busy occasions
Add support for doorbell device doorbell_graham_cracker

3.0.0-beta.11.en: Add processing of new refresh token

3.0.0-beta.9.en: Refresh location every 2 hours for more stability

3.0.0-beta.8.en: Fix writing to iobroker-data/files folder (thx to Apollon)

3.0.0-beta.4.en:
Rewrite V3 (Breaking Changes listed below)
Update packages
Fix in github release workflow

2.0.0-beta.0.en:
Update package
Add JS-Controller 4.0 dependency
On ding --> First take snapshot then livestream

1.2.6.en:
Update packages
Stop adapter on unhandled Error
Terminate adapter on invalid ring credentials
1.2.6.de:
Pakete aktualisieren
Adapter bei unbehandeltem Fehler stoppen
Adapter bei ungültigen Ringanmeldeinformationen beenden
1.2.6.ru:
Пакеты обновлений
Остановить адаптер при необработанной ошибке
Завершить адаптер при неверных учетных данных кольца
1.2.6.pt:
Pacotes de atualização
Pare o adaptador em erro não tratado
Encerrar o adaptador com credenciais de anel inválidas
1.2.6.nl:
Pakketten bijwerken
Stop adapter bij onverwerkte fout
Beëindig adapter op ongeldige ringreferenties

Mettre à jour les packages
Arrêter l'adaptateur en cas d'erreur non gérée
Mettre fin à l'adaptateur sur des informations d'identification de sonnerie non valides

Aggiorna pacchetti
Arresta l'adattatore in caso di errore non gestito
Termina l'adattatore con credenziali di anello non valide

Detener el adaptador en caso de error no manejado
Terminar adaptador en credenciales de anillo no válidas

Zakończ kartę z nieprawidłowymi danymi uwierzytelniającymi dzwonek

更新包
在未处理的错误上停止适配器
